meta.description: Optimize the number of commercials on three streaming platforms to maximize audience reach within budget and platform constraints.

sets.name: PLATFORMS
sets.description: The streaming platforms where commercials can be run.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost of running a commercial on each platform.

params.name: reach
params.description: Audience reach of a commercial on each platform.

vars.name: num_commercials
vars.description: Number of commercials to run on each platform.

objective.name: max_total_reach
objective.expr: sum(num_commercials[p] * reach[p] for p in ['Pi TV', 'Beta Video', 'Gamma Live'])
objective.description: Maximize the total audience reach across all platforms.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(num_commercials[p] * cost[p] for p in ['Pi TV', 'Beta Video', 'Gamma Live'])
constraints.description: Total cost of commercials must not exceed the budget.

constraints.name: beta_video_limit
constraints.description: Beta Video limits the number of commercials to 8.

constraints.name: gamma_live_limit
constraints.expr_rhs: sum(num_commercials[p] for p in ['Pi TV', 'Beta Video', 'Gamma Live']) / 3
constraints.description: At most a third of all commercials should occur on Gamma Live.

constraints.name: pi_tv_minimum
constraints.expr_rhs: 0.2 * sum(num_commercials[p] for p in ['Pi TV', 'Beta Video', 'Gamma Live'])
constraints.description: At least 20% of all commercials should occur on Pi TV.
